scripts.pull: git fetch origin && git pull origin
scripts.commit: git commit -m v$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F= "{ print $2 }" | sed 's/[version:,\",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.commit:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version --force && npm run commit
scripts.tag:version: git tag v$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F= "{ print $2 }" | sed 's/[version:,\",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
